Articles.Content:
This is an awesome space sim, thank you! I've lost a whole week already. And thank you for text-based .craft, .sfs and .cfg files!! It's nice to see that the data isn't hidden in a binary format. Is there a user's manual? I've been looking, but do not see one here or on the Steam site. I have found two wikis that have been very useful, but a manual would be nice.

Happy flying!

The tutorial in game should help.

And welcome to the game!
Any video by Scott Manley. I wouldn't have gotten off the ground if it wasn't for his videos.
I agree with Ham...the ingame tuts I thought were a waste of time and made the game frustrating to start but Scott Manley's videos are really very good.

Welcome to the community flux.faraday

Yeah I also suggest Scott Manleys vids, as unfortunately nearly all the player made tutorials on this site were lost recently.

Have fun learning to fly safe!
Thank you! I'll check those videos out.
